title: Monitoring issues
description:
A summary all common roots that could cause graphs issues: 

1. snmpd isn't running/got stuck
Suggestion: kill or/and restart it

2. strackerd got stuck in some environment - it gathers statistic from all env's, and one stuck process will stop further gathering of information. 
Suggestion: killing/restarting

3. rrd_update got stuck, it should run each one minute and finish working in few seconds
Suggestion: kill stuck and wait until it run from cron

Kindly use ps and locate/grep to investigate those issues. Looking into logs could help you to find more reasons that affect monitoring graphs.

Looking into logs could help you to find more reasons that affect monitoring graphs.
